title: Maintenance in all servers
body: This message is for all divisions of the bureau.  Starting today, the servers may suffer instability due to the latest maintenance measures. Please back up key docs.   admin

title: DID YOU SEE IT
body: Oh my god how did they lose it? And worst of all, to the god damn mariners.  Don't tell Russ I said this, but Rodriguez is a hell of a short stop.  Far too good for that rinky dink operation at least.  Anyway, let me know when you've got the Westchester files, I'll need eyes on before Thursday. JM
